original_text:
and the fading flower of its glorious beauty,
    which is on the head of the rich valley,
will be like a first-ripe fig before the summer:
    when someone sees it, he swallows it
    as soon as it is in his hand.
korean_text: 그 기름진 골짜기 꼭대기에 있는 그의 영화가 쇠잔해 가는 꽃이 여름 전에 처음 익은 무화과와 같으리니 보는 자가 그것을 보고 얼른 따서 먹으리로다

sentences.original_text: and the fading flower of its glorious beauty,
which is on the head of the rich valley,
will be like a first-ripe fig before the summer:
sentences.korean_translation: 여름 전에 익은 첫 무화과와 같으리니

sentences.original_text: as soon as it is in his hand.
